page.title: 20TRIP TO SB House.
page.content: rea where there was equipment for show umping and horse training.Beyond the dry stone wall was the pasture leading down to what was an ornamental pond in a landscaped area.As we were going back to school we decided that the cameraman should sit at the back of the minibus with the doors open to take final shots of the drive and gates.Mr Snowball a retired colonel is going to send usmore information about the House.Mr Liffney who is the area retail manager for Zannussi showed us an old book from his library which told about one of the past owners who had become Lord Mayor of Newcastle and had been knighted for his work. We will follow that up as part of our 365 Communications course and our TVEI Media Studies. The video film will be lent to our local First and Middle schools to help them with local work
